title: How to Complete the Demon Slayer Quest in RuneScape

steps.title: Speak to the Gypsy in Varrock.
steps.content: Speak to the Gypsy in Varrock. She is next to the clothing store. She will tell you to pay her 1gp to read your future. Give her the money and ask her to tell you about someone who defeated a demon. Ask her about the Magical Incantation, and write it down on a piece of paper.

steps.title: Talk to Sir Prysin in the Varock castle.
steps.content: Talk to Sir Prysin in the Varock castle. He is on the left side when you enter the castle. He says that he has the Silverlight, but he needs 3 keys to open the box.

steps.title: Talk to Captain Rovin by climbing 2 sets of stairs in the North-West corner of the castle.
steps.content: Talk to Captain Rovin by climbing 2 sets of stairs in the North-West corner of the castle. Argue with him and he finally lets you have the 1st key.

steps.title: Go to the drain outside the kitchen North-East.
steps.content: Go to the drain outside the kitchen North-East. You will see the key by clicking "Search Drain". Use a bucket of water to wash it down to the varrock sewer.

steps.title: Go down the Varrock Sewer to get the key.
steps.content: Go down the Varrock Sewer to get the key. If you go through the passage on the left, you will find the rusty second key near a small river and some zombies on the other side.

steps.title: Go to the wizards tower and speak to Wizard Trailborn on the 2nd floor.
steps.content: Go to the wizards tower and speak to Wizard Trailborn on the 2nd floor. He needs 25 bones to open the box containing the third key.

steps.title: Get some bones by killing chicken in Port Sarim.
steps.content: Get some bones by killing chicken in Port Sarim.

steps.title: Go back to Wizard Trailborn and get the third key.
steps.content: Go back to Wizard Trailborn and get the third key.

steps.title: Talk to Captain Rovin and he will give you the Silverlight sword.
steps.content: Talk to Captain Rovin and he will give you the Silverlight sword.

steps.title: Head over to the Stone Circle just south of Varrock, after you got food and your equipment ready.
steps.content: Head over to the Stone Circle just south of Varrock, after you got food and your equipment ready. (Don't forget your Silverlight Sword)

steps.title: Kill the demon after a cut screen.
steps.content: Kill the demon after a cut screen.

steps.title: Recite the Incantation and you have killed the demon!
steps.content: Recite the Incantation and you have killed the demon!
